articles.author: Luke Albigés
articles.title: Microsoft ending Windows 8 support today, multiple games affected - TrueAchievements
articles.description: Time is finally up for Windows 8, with support for Microsoft's legacy operating system set to end today. New app purchases won't be possible after today, although existing ones will still be usable with the sunset system.
